mainSequence.step: User initiates removal of audio effect by selecting the remove option from the dropdown menu.
Dropdown item handles the request to remove the effect.
Audio effect action triggers the removal of the effect.
Audio effect saga initiates the removal of the effect.
Event emitter emits an event 'EFFECT_DELETE_EFFECT' to signal the effect deletion.
Audio controller removes the effect from the audio.
Audio effect action completes the removal process.
